name: Youth Advocacy
description: LYRIC's programs are open to lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender, queer, and questioning (LGBTQQ) youth and allies (24 and younger). Youth Advocates can help you with: - Legal name change - Gender change - Documentation - Housing applications - Job search - Assistance budgeting - School enrollment - Counseling - Referrals - Connection to HIV/STI testing and treatment
